name: sumun
description: Hi. I'm a starter theme called _s, or underscores, if you like. I'm a theme meant for hacking so don't use me as a Parent Theme. Instead try turning me into the next, most awesome, WordPress theme out there. That's what I'm here for.
author: Sumun

scripts.compile:css: node-sass sass/ -o ./ && stylelint '*.css' --output-style compressed --fix || true && stylelint '*.css' --output-style compressed --fix
scripts.compile:editorcss: node-sass sass/style-editor.scss -o ./ && stylelint '*.css' --fix --output-file compressed || true && stylelint '*.css' --fix --output-file compressed
scripts.bundle: dir-archiver --src . --dest ../sumun.zip --exclude .DS_Store .stylelintrc.json .eslintrc .git .gitattributes .github .gitignore README.md composer.json composer.lock node_modules vendor package-lock.json package.json .travis.yml phpcs.xml.dist sass style.css.map yarn.lock
scripts.dev: npm run watch & npm run sync
